title: Vuelta a España 2024: Your Ultimate Preview – Route, Riders, Rivalries, TV, and a Return of ‘GC Kuss’
content:
Can Sepp Kuss strike twice? A wildly unpredictable GC field and a mass of mountaintop finishes will determine his title defense.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España 2024: Your Ultimate Preview – Route, Riders, Rivalries, TV, and a Return of ‘GC Kuss’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
